titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: DIFFUSION CAPACITY TEST RESULT - Description

div.p: DIFFUSION CAPACITY TEST RESULT is the result of the Clinical Investigation which measures the PATIENT's Diffusion Capacity Test as a percentage.
The result is in the range 0-200.
Note: the result for this test is usually less than 100%, but it is possible for it to be above 100% as it is percentage predicted.
